column4: Ist's this post which I've posted on ubuntuforums also http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=361845 can somebody help?

we won'T help you if you don't tell us what is wrong

kbrooks: mneptok: right guys, I just installed it, and then installed ubuntu as the guest OS
kbrooks: mneptok: now my problem is somehow I don't remember the username I entered while installing , any ideas what can I do?
you should be ashamed,  ubuntu deserves nothing less then being the main OS
I have ubuntu feisty as the main OS, I'm making another in VMware for gusty (breakage)
gksu gedit /boot/grub/menu.list   ,look for the timeer or delay or something like that
why did u tell me gksu ? I usually use sudo
what's the difference between gksu & sudo?
gksu to launch  gui apps,  sudo for cli
